title: Candle In the Window
description: "Papa" Emily asked in a soft voice, "Would it be okay if we put a candle in the window?" Her father's forehead wrinkled with confusion at her question. "Why do you want to do that?" "So Mama can find her way home," she said innocently.â€” This is the first Christmas without Mama, and John's family is struggling to face the holiday without his loving wife. However, eight-year-old Emily is convinced her mother will come and visit her on Christmas Eve. And right now, Emily needs her mother more than ever. Bring the magic and wonder of Christmas into your heart with this heartwarming picture book that is perfect for a wintry evening read-aloud. It just may begin a new tradition in your family. Published October 2006 32 pages
author: Michele Bell
